| <style="border: none;">'''Edubuntu''' is a Linux distribution targeted for schools and other educational environments.  It is a complete operating system, built on the popular <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu]]</nowiki> distribution, that includes an office suite, web browser, many educational applications, and much more. Edubuntu is designed for a teacher or network administrator to be able to setup a complete classroom quickly and easily.
| <style="border: none;">
|}
